description.value:
This magic weapon has 3 charges and regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. While holding the weapon, you can take a Magic|XPHB action and expend 1 charge to release a wave of terror from it. Each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened|XPHB condition for 1 minute. While Frightened|XPHB in this way, a creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't make Opportunity Attack|XPHB|Opportunity Attacks. For its action, it can use only the Dash|XPHB action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If it has nowhere it can move, the creature can take the Dodge|XPHB action. At the end of each of its turns, a creature repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Attunement: true
